Chi Mastery stacks increase the effectiveness of a Stance affix by 20% per stack: Crane Stance Health on Hit effect Leopard Stance Leopard Strike damage Tiger Stance Critical Hit Rating effect Dragon Stance Deflect Rating effect Snake Stance Venomous Chi damage

Chi Overload triggers automatically when you use Like Unto Iron (if not already on cooldown) Stance Openers gain +25% damage
